parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the windshield wipers can reduce visibility during rainy or snowy conditions, increasing the risk of accidents and compromising driver safety.
symptoms: or quit while turned on; wipers may start working again after a few minutes or may not work at all; wipers may need to be manually started by moving the wiper arm; wiper failure is more frequent in warm weather.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering linkage can cause a loss of steering control, leading to accidents, especially at high speeds.

The intake manifold gasket leak can cause coolant to mix with engine oil, leading to engine damage, overheating, and potentially causing the engine to seize or fail, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.

The deterioration of the Dex-Cool coolant system can cause corrosion and damage to engine components, leading to engine failure, overheating, and potentially causing the engine to seize or fail, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
